americanExpress.name: American Express
americanExpress.description: Developed several reusable UI components with full comprehensive unit tests that have been implemented in several applications, saving time for other developers and expediting delivery schedules for multiple development teams

uOfA.name: University of Arizona
uOfA.description: Developed innovative, valid, and reliable research methods relevant to projects conducted in lab to allow for faster data procession; and trained new undergraduate students on those methods. In addition to this I also conducted statistical analysis using R, Python, SQL, and Tableau to determine, understand, and visualize relationships between variables/parameters of interest
